name: weddingshare
description: WeddingShare is a self-hosted photo and media sharing platform for weddings and events. Guests can upload, view, and download pictures in a private, beautifully themed gallery.
features: Photo sharing: Allow wedding guests to upload photos and videos from the celebration in real-time.
Private galleries: Create password-protected galleries accessible only to invited guests for privacy.
Bulk upload: Enable guests to upload multiple photos at once from smartphones or cameras.
Download options: Let guests download individual photos or entire albums in high resolution.
Responsive design: Provide an optimized experience on mobile devices where most guest photos are taken.
No registration required: Allow guests to participate without creating accounts or providing personal information.
Themed interface: Customize the gallery appearance with wedding-themed designs and couple's photos.
Moderation tools: Review and approve photos before they appear publicly to maintain quality and appropriateness.
Slideshow mode: Display uploaded photos in an automatic slideshow for viewing during or after the event.
Social sharing: Enable guests to share favorite photos on social media directly from the gallery.
Storage management: Organize photos by event, date, or uploader with automatic thumbnail generation.
QR code access: Generate QR codes for easy gallery access that can be displayed at the venue.
